DOC.brief_summary: The arthritis-specific Arthritis Self Help Course ( ASHC ) generic Chronic Disease Self Management Program ( CDSMP ) teach generalizable skill manage arthritis chronic disease . In location may feasible combine effort offer generic course rather arthritis-specific program . However anecdotal evidence question whether people arthritis obtain much benefit generic course arthritis-specific course . The primary purpose research study compare health outcome among people arthritis participate either ASHC CDSMP . The University Illinois Project emphasize recruit balance uran rural participant . The result research use guide Arthritis program recommendation use ASHC CDSMP improve quality life people arthritis .
